grouplist for context buttons 2 92 415 910 9000 3110 3110 50 vertical 400
413 DefContextButton2 List Container.SetViewMode(50) Close
413 DefContextButton2 Big list Container.SetViewMode(52) Close !Window.IsActive(pictures)
413 DefContextButton2 InfoWall 1 Container.SetViewMode(55) Close Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(sets)
